title: Pixel 5 release date in India when it will come to sale in India and when pixel 4a 5g release in Ind
content:
When will the pixel 5 release in India there has not been still any confirmation regarding that?
Not even a single website or any gadgets news show discusses about pixel 5 being released in India.
Some say it will come in 19 dec and pixel 4a 5g is suppose to come on 24 dec in india?
I want to buy pixel 5 in India and here in Amazon they are selling at a very high price of Rs 75000 that is almost over 1000 US$ as comapared to the original price which is 650 US$ dollars.
Any idea when pixel 5 come in India or should I go buy the iphone 12 pro max which is damn expensive almost Rs 1,40,000 256 gb variant
